data.actual_result: The screen will make a jump animation and the keyboard stays open while losing focus on the field
data.expected_result: It should just close the keyboard, as in the Quick Switcher
data.short_description: Pressing Enter/Submit key on your keyboard in the Invite your friends search field will cause the screen to jump and the keyboard to stay up
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Create Instant Invite page in any server - In the user search field, type something that gives some results (CNR if no result) - Tap the Enter/Submit key of your keyboard
